profile_summary:

My expertise includes strong proficiency in **Java**, **C**, and **C++**, along with familiarity in utilizing **Coroutines** and **RxJava** to build responsive Android applications. Additionally, I bring a robust background in the healthcare and financial sectors, where I have successfully led projects that adhere to compliance standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS, ensuring secure and high-quality deliverables. My experience with CI/CD automation and unit testing has further empowered me to implement best practices in software development and provide coherent English communication with cross-functional teams.
